get.description: Fetch all available packages for businesses.
Fetch all available packages for businesses.

post.summary: Upload product documents from zip file
post.description: Upload a ZIP file containing product documents organized by SKU folders, extract and process them to S3, and update product records in the database.

zip_file.description: ZIP file containing product documents organized in folders by SKU

document_count.description: Number of documents processed for this SKU

error.example: Unable to open the zip file

items.example: The zip file field is required.

post.description: This endpoint sends an email to the provided address.

get.description: Fetch user/business dashboard overview. Requires Bearer token.
Fetch all discussions. Requires Bearer token.

title.example: How to improve SEO for my business?

delete.description: Delete a keyword assigned to the user or business by ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the assigned keyword to delete

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of assigned keywords for the authenticated user or business.

200.description: List of assigned keywords with pagination

get.description: Fetch list of leads for the authenticated user/business. Requires Bearer token.

message.example: I am interested in your services.

get.description: Fetch all enquiries received by the authenticated business. Requires Bearer token.

message.example: I want to know more about your services.

get.description: Returns profile details of the logged-in user. Requires Bearer token.

post.description: Stores profile information like email, year of establishment, display info, intro, and certifications.

business_intro.example: We are a leading provider of IT services established in 2020.

items.example: The email must be a valid email address.
The year of establishment field is required.

get.description: Fetches the business profile logo of the authenticated user. Requires Bearer token.

post.summary: Upload business logo and profile picture
post.description: Uploads the business logo and profile picture for the authenticated user. Requires Bearer token.

items.example: The logo must be an image.
The profile_pic must be an image.

delete.description: Deletes the current business logo of the authenticated user. Requires Bearer token.

message.example: No logo found for this user

delete.description: Deletes the current profile picture of the authenticated user. Requires Bearer token.
